metadata.title: YUICompressor .NET
metadata.authors: Pure Krome, Justin Etheredge, Daniel Crenna
metadata.summary: Minify and/or Combine JavaScript and/or Cascading Style Sheets.
metadata.description:
This library allow you to minify and/or combine any Javascript and/or Cascading Style Sheets. It includes an MSBuild task so TFS or Web Applications (MVC or WebForms) can automate this process, per build.
This is a direct .NET port of the original Yahoo! UI Library: YUI Compressor.
